mapper.update: UPDATE POST SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, PRICE = #{price}, PHOTOURL = #{photoUrl} WHERE POST_IDX = #{postIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT PHOTOURL, POST_IDX AS POSTIDX, REGISTER_ID AS REGISTERID, PRICE, TITLE, CONTENT FROM POST WHERE REGISTER_ID = #{registerId} AND NOT BORDER_TYPE = 'auction'
SELECT PHOTOURL, POST_IDX AS POSTIDX, REGISTER_ID AS registerId, PRICE, TITLE, CONTENT FROM POST WHERE NOT BORDER_TYPE = 'auction' AND TRANSACTION_CONFIRMATION = 'no'
SELECT PHOTOURL, POST_IDX AS POSTIDX, REGISTER_ID AS REGISTERID, PRICE, TITLE, CONTENT, BORDER_TYPE FROM POST WHERE BORDER_TYPE = #{borderType} AND TRANSACTION_CONFIRMATION = 'no'
SELECT MAX(POST_IDX) AS POSTIDX FROM POST
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST (post_Idx, register_Id, title, border_type, price, content, transaction_confirmation, photoUrl) VALUES(#{postIdx}, #{registerId}, #{title}, #{borderType}, #{price}, #{content}, 'no', #{photoUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT P.TITLE, P.PRICE, P.TRANSACTION_CONFIRMATION AS TRANSACTIONCONFIRMATION, P.POST_IDX AS POSTIDX, T.BUYER_ID AS BUYERID FROM POST P LEFT JOIN TRANSACTIONS T ON P.POST_IDX = T.POST_IDX WHERE T.BUYER_ID = #{buyerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND NOT P.BORDER_TYPE = 'auction' AND P.TRANSACTION_CONFIRMATION = 'WAIT'

SELECT P.REGISTER_ID AS REGISTERID, P.TITLE, P.PRICE, P.TRANSACTION_CONFIRMATION AS TRANSACTIONCONFIRMATION FROM POST P LEFT JOIN TRANSACTIONS T ON P.POST_IDX = T.POST_IDX WHERE T.BUYER_ID = #{buyerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND P.TRANSACTION_CONFIRMATION = 'COMPLETED' OR P.TRANSACTION_CONFIRMATION = 'DECIDE'
